Transform between spherical coordinates and phisical coordinates

Source: R/helpfunctions.R

Transform a longitude or latitude interval into the equivalent in meters depending on latitude.

dlon(dx, lat, a = 6731000)

dlat(dy, a = 6731000)

dx(dlon, lat, a = 6731000)

dy(dlat, a = 6731000)

Arguments

dx, dy

interval in meters
lat

latitude, in degrees
a

radius of the Earth
dlon, dlat

interval in degrees

Examples


library(data.table)
data(geopotential)
geopotential <- geopotential[date == date[1]]

# Geostrophic wind
geopotential[, c("u", "v") := GeostrophicWind(gh, lon, lat)]  # in meters/second
#>         lon   lat lev       gh       date  u          v
#>    1:   0.0 -22.5 700 3163.839 1990-01-01 NA  1.0807091
#>    2:   2.5 -22.5 700 3162.516 1990-01-01 NA  0.5513294
#>    3:   5.0 -22.5 700 3162.226 1990-01-01 NA  0.0661829
#>    4:   7.5 -22.5 700 3162.323 1990-01-01 NA -0.2976979
#>    5:  10.0 -22.5 700 3163.097 1990-01-01 NA -0.7498781
#>   ---                                                  
#> 4028: 347.5 -90.0 700 2715.936 1990-01-01 NA  0.0000000
#> 4029: 350.0 -90.0 700 2715.936 1990-01-01 NA  0.0000000
#> 4030: 352.5 -90.0 700 2715.936 1990-01-01 NA  0.0000000
#> 4031: 355.0 -90.0 700 2715.936 1990-01-01 NA  0.0000000
#> 4032: 357.5 -90.0 700 2715.936 1990-01-01 NA  0.0000000
geopotential[, c("dlon", "dlat") := .(dlon(u, lat), dlat(v))] # in degrees/second
#>         lon   lat lev       gh       date  u          v dlon          dlat
#>    1:   0.0 -22.5 700 3163.839 1990-01-01 NA  1.0807091   NA  9.199238e-06
#>    2:   2.5 -22.5 700 3162.516 1990-01-01 NA  0.5513294   NA  4.693039e-06
#>    3:   5.0 -22.5 700 3162.226 1990-01-01 NA  0.0661829   NA  5.633636e-07
#>    4:   7.5 -22.5 700 3162.323 1990-01-01 NA -0.2976979   NA -2.534071e-06
#>    5:  10.0 -22.5 700 3163.097 1990-01-01 NA -0.7498781   NA -6.383130e-06
#>   ---                                                                     
#> 4028: 347.5 -90.0 700 2715.936 1990-01-01 NA  0.0000000   NA  0.000000e+00
#> 4029: 350.0 -90.0 700 2715.936 1990-01-01 NA  0.0000000   NA  0.000000e+00
#> 4030: 352.5 -90.0 700 2715.936 1990-01-01 NA  0.0000000   NA  0.000000e+00
#> 4031: 355.0 -90.0 700 2715.936 1990-01-01 NA  0.0000000   NA  0.000000e+00
#> 4032: 357.5 -90.0 700 2715.936 1990-01-01 NA  0.0000000   NA  0.000000e+00
geopotential[, c("u2", "v2") := .(dx(dlon, lat), dy(dlat))]   # again in degrees/second
#>         lon   lat lev       gh       date  u          v dlon          dlat u2
#>    1:   0.0 -22.5 700 3163.839 1990-01-01 NA  1.0807091   NA  9.199238e-06 NA
#>    2:   2.5 -22.5 700 3162.516 1990-01-01 NA  0.5513294   NA  4.693039e-06 NA
#>    3:   5.0 -22.5 700 3162.226 1990-01-01 NA  0.0661829   NA  5.633636e-07 NA
#>    4:   7.5 -22.5 700 3162.323 1990-01-01 NA -0.2976979   NA -2.534071e-06 NA
#>    5:  10.0 -22.5 700 3163.097 1990-01-01 NA -0.7498781   NA -6.383130e-06 NA
#>   ---                                                                        
#> 4028: 347.5 -90.0 700 2715.936 1990-01-01 NA  0.0000000   NA  0.000000e+00 NA
#> 4029: 350.0 -90.0 700 2715.936 1990-01-01 NA  0.0000000   NA  0.000000e+00 NA
#> 4030: 352.5 -90.0 700 2715.936 1990-01-01 NA  0.0000000   NA  0.000000e+00 NA
#> 4031: 355.0 -90.0 700 2715.936 1990-01-01 NA  0.0000000   NA  0.000000e+00 NA
#> 4032: 357.5 -90.0 700 2715.936 1990-01-01 NA  0.0000000   NA  0.000000e+00 NA
#>               v2
#>    1:  1.0807091
#>    2:  0.5513294
#>    3:  0.0661829
#>    4: -0.2976979
#>    5: -0.7498781
#>   ---           
#> 4028:  0.0000000
#> 4029:  0.0000000
#> 4030:  0.0000000
#> 4031:  0.0000000
#> 4032:  0.0000000
